EmailTemplate.name: PWS_Website_Registration.PWS Registration Confirmation - New
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Pivotal Web Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to the future of agile development!
You can rapidly update and scale across multiple environments and let Pivotal Web Services maintain your app's health in production.
Start by pushing your first app with our 15-minute tutorial.
Get Started <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry/introduction?utm_source=welcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gettingstartedwithpcf]]>
Until next time,
The Pivotal Web Services Team
Pivotal Web Services, and the Pivotal Web Services logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Pivotal Software, Inc. in the United States and other countries. All other trademarks used herein are the property of their respective owners.
Questions or comments? Contact Us <[[mailto:support@run.pivotal.io?subject=]]>
